0:
Hello everyone, my name is Eugene. On this channel I will make the most interesting and funny cuts from the simpsons. Thanks for the likes, subscriptions, and comments❤
I love the simpsons very much, I watched almost all the episodes several times, so I can find the best and funny moments in the series and highlight them :)
I edit the video in the program: Sony Vegas pro 15, on each video I try 4 hours a day on average, I try to make it as good as possible for the audience!
And so I cut and mount the video myself, write to me and I will send proofs :)

I am very glad that I have such an audience, because I really tried very hard every day for 3 months, I am grateful to everyone, I love everyone❤❤❤
